mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT A.NAME FROM MEMBER_MST A WHERE N.RECV_EMAIL = A.EMAIL) as recv_name, (SELECT B.NAME FROM MEMBER_MST B WHERE N.SEND_EMAIL = B.EMAIL) as send_name, N.SEND_EMAIL AS send_email, N.RECV_EMAIL AS recv_email, N.STATE AS state, N.MESSAGE as message, N.LOG_DATE AS log_date, N.SERIAL_NO AS serial_no, N.READ_FLAG AS read_flag, N.IDX AS idx FROM NEWSPEED N WHERE 1=1 AND N.RECV_EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY N.LOG_DATE DESC

SELECT (SELECT A.NAME FROM MEMBER_MST A WHERE N.RECV_EMAIL = A.EMAIL) as recv_name, (SELECT B.NAME FROM MEMBER_MST B WHERE N.SEND_EMAIL = B.EMAIL) as send_name, N.SEND_EMAIL AS send_email, N.RECV_EMAIL AS recv_email, N.STATE AS state, N.MESSAGE as message, N.LOG_DATE AS log_date, N.SERIAL_NO AS serial_no, N.READ_FLAG AS read_flag, N.IDX AS idx FROM NEWSPEED N WHERE 1=1 AND N.IDX = #{idx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.KEY_ID as key_id, A.MEMBER_ID as member_id, A.SERIAL_NO as serial_no, A.GRADE as grade, A.STATE as state, A.EMAIL as email, A.crt_email as crt_email FROM KEY_MST A WHERE A.EMAIL = #{recv_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SERIAL_NO = #{serial_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRT_EMAIL = #{send_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.STATE = 'GRANTING'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NEWSPEED N WHERE N.IDX = #{idx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE KEY_MST A SET A.STATE='ACTIVE' WHERE A.KEY_ID=#{key_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM KEY_VAL_TIME A WHERE A.KEY_ID=#{key_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
